author: hship
msg: Update the Tutorial to match some changes to the framework.

author: hship
msg: Add IComponent.getComponent() method which exposes a Map property on all components that in turn exposes contained components.
Add properties to serveral components (such as Foreach) that are accessible by wrapped components.
Create RenderOnlyPropertyException which is thrown when accessing a render-only property when the component is not renderring.
Spell-check and otherwise improve the documentation.

author: hship
msg: Add new PropertySelection component and related classes.
Make some form-related components not notify their listeners if they are disabled.

author: hship
msg: Change the ComponentSpecification.toString() method to display the specification path instead of the class name.
Add the first pass at the Tapestry Whitepaper.
Improve the Tapestry design document; describe the built-in components.

author: hship
msg: Move Tapestry documentation into the Tapestry module.
